title: Anyone's game crush like this today?
body:
I installed the latest patch, and everything was running perfectly fine. Then i go into a game there's no issues champ select ran fine, but once i exited champion select and began to go into the loading for the game it crashed giving me a bug splat and the go back to the reconnect page .I am not sure what could have caused this at all, and due to this crash i was labeled as a  Leaver.
i wanna know anyone has the same issue as mine?

replies.body: same,my friend can connect to severs. but my games always crashed after i selected a champ.

I have the same problem, been 4 games already try all the listing solutions. afraid to start a games now!!! I am not a leaver. I think it's this patch because it never happen to me before. hope fix soon finger cross. {{item:3690}}
SAME. My Canadian friends can connect to severs. I live in NZ and keep reconnecting during loading. Ocean server is  fine for me.

It is likely related to the content described in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I would recommend reading through that and posting there
i tried all the things you guys mentioned in that but nothing works. i try to install the latest rayzer synapse and uninstall it then but nothing works
posting in the other thread (if you haven't already) would be more valuable.  The people who are equipped to help are monitoring that thread.
i did uninstalled everything but it still crash on the same moment
Got the same issue this afternoon. Waiting for some official words here
yes! literally what i've been dealing with today! got me leaverbusted too!
